tool_description:
This Movies API contains the data of the best movies ever made in a very easy-to-use and organized format.

Great choice for REST API based Frontend Developer Projects.

In the case of accessing the complete list, the Cover image, Rank, Title, Thumbnail, Rating, Id, Year, Images, Description, Trailer, Genre, Director, Writer and ID of the movies are listed.

This is a lightweight web service, (REST interface), which provides an easy way to access our database.

An API (Application programming...
name: List Movies v3
title: List Movies v3

api_list.name: Movie Details
api_list.description: Returns the information about a specific movie

optional_parameters.name: movie_id
optional_parameters.description: The YTS ID of the movie or the IMDB ID

optional_parameters.name: imdb_id
optional_parameters.description: The YTS ID of the movie or the IMDB ID

optional_parameters.name: with_cast
optional_parameters.description: When set the data returned will include the added information about the cast

optional_parameters.name: with_images
optional_parameters.description: When set the data returned will include the added image URLs

movie.description_intro: In Talbot, Ohio, a father's need for surgeries puts the family in a financial bind. His son Vince, an electrician, overhears a man talking about making a fortune in just a day. When the man overdoses on drugs, Vince finds instructions and a cell phone that the man has received and substitutes himself: taking a train to New York and awaiting contact. He has no idea what it's about. He ends up at a remote house where wealthy men bet on who will survive a complicated game of Russian roulette: he's number 13. In flashbacks we meet other contestants, including a man whose brother takes him out of a mental institution in order to compete. Can Vince be the last one standing?—
movie.description_full: In Talbot, Ohio, a father's need for surgeries puts the family in a financial bind. His son Vince, an electrician, overhears a man talking about making a fortune in just a day. When the man overdoses on drugs, Vince finds instructions and a cell phone that the man has received and substitutes himself: taking a train to New York and awaiting contact. He has no idea what it's about. He ends up at a remote house where wealthy men bet on who will survive a complicated game of Russian roulette: he's number 13. In flashbacks we meet other contestants, including a man whose brother takes him out of a mental institution in order to compete. Can Vince be the last one standing?—

api_list.name: Movie Parental Guides
api_list.description: Returns all the parental guide ratings for the specified movie
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://list-movies-v3.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/movie_parental_guides.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "list-movies-v3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://list-movies-v3.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/movie_parental_guides.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "list-movies-v3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Movie Suggestions
api_list.description: Returns 4 related movies as suggestions for the user

movies.title: For the Boys
movies.summary: USO entertainers Dixie Leonard and Eddie Sparks travel and perform together through World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The story of their adventures together, filled with love, laughter, and tears, is related in flashbacks by Dixie on the eve of being awarded a medal by the President.—Dan Larsen
movies.description_full: USO entertainers Dixie Leonard and Eddie Sparks travel and perform together through World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The story of their adventures together, filled with love, laughter, and tears, is related in flashbacks by Dixie on the eve of being awarded a medal by the President.—Dan Larsen
movies.synopsis: USO entertainers Dixie Leonard and Eddie Sparks travel and perform together through World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The story of their adventures together, filled with love, laughter, and tears, is related in flashbacks by Dixie on the eve of being awarded a medal by the President.—Dan Larsen

movies.title: Sanmon yakusha
movies.summary: Film inspired by the life of Japanese actor Taiji Tonoyama, with whom Kaneto Shindo had worked on many occasions, with the help of archive images and fragments of the most famous films of the director. The actress Nobuko Otowa adds dialogues facing the camera, as if she was talking to Tonoyama and remembering together old episodes of the interpreter, a past marked by alcoholism and a hectic sex life.—jsanchez
movies.description_full: Film inspired by the life of Japanese actor Taiji Tonoyama, with whom Kaneto Shindo had worked on many occasions, with the help of archive images and fragments of the most famous films of the director. movies.title: Wonders of the Sea
movies.summary: Armed with cutting-edge 3D technology, French ocean explorer Jean-Michel Cousteau and his adult children explore the ocean and learn about what puts it at risk.
movies.description_full: Armed with cutting-edge 3D technology, French ocean explorer Jean-Michel Cousteau and his adult children explore the ocean and learn about what puts it at risk.
movies.synopsis: Armed with cutting-edge 3D technology, French ocean explorer Jean-Michel Cousteau and his adult children explore the ocean and learn about what puts it at risk.

movies.title: A Bride's Revenge
movies.summary: Owning a successful hair salon and about to be married to the man of her dreams, MIYA doesn't think things can get any better. Things quickly begin to fall apart when she receives a wedding invitation - to the wedding of her fiancé Ian and his ex-fiancée Lori. Soon Miya is being stalked by an eerie bride dressed in a wedding gown and veil and Ian begins to suspect Miya might be making it all up. When a series of horrifying events start to occur, Miya is convinced that Lori is carrying out a twisted and deadly plan of revenge.—Johnson Production Group
movies.description_full: Owning a successful hair salon and about to be married to the man of her dreams, MIYA doesn't think things can get any better. api_list.name: List Movies
api_list.description: Used to list and search through out all the available movies. Can sort, filter, search and order the results

optional_parameters.name: genre
optional_parameters.description: Used to filter by a given genre (See http://www.imdb.com/genre/ for full list)

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description: Orders the results by either Ascending or Descending order.

optional_parameters.name: with_rt_ratings
optional_parameters.description: Returns the list with the Rotten Tomatoes rating included.

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description: Sorts the results by choosen value.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: used to see the next page of movies, eg limit=15 and page=2 will show you movies 15-30.

optional_parameters.name: query_term
optional_parameters.description: Used for movie search, matching on: Movie Title/IMDB Code, Actor Name/IMDb, Director Name/IMDb Code.

optional_parameters.name: quality
optional_parameters.description: Used to filter by a given quality.

optional_parameters.name: minimum_rating
optional_parameters.description: used to filter movie by a given minimum IMDB rating.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The limit of results per page that has been set.
